page.title: 06HOME LIFE IN LYTHE
page.content: {HOME LIFE:- My name is Karl and I live on a farm not far from Lythe.I am 11 years old and go to Lythe village school.When I am not at school I spend most of my time working on the farm with my Dad. We have to feed our sheep and cattle each day. Sometimes I go to Lythe with my Dad because he has some fields and animals there. After work,we go back to the farm for our dinner.On Sunday we have a big dinner of meat,potatoes,vegetables, Yorkshire Pudding and gravy.During the week we usually have meat or sausages and chips. The rest of the time I spend playing outside on my bike or with my favourite toy which is a swingball. After my tea, I sometimes watch television until it is time to go to bed.
